name: Springbok Air Academy (Vluytjeskraal)
about: Springbok Air Academy, located at Vluytjeskraal, is a unique and comprehensive flight training organization. Founded on a passion for vintage aviation by Captain Flippie Vermeulen, the academy goes beyond mere flight instruction, mentoring students to become professional aviators. It offers specialized training in Tailwheel Endorsements and ratings on rare aircraft such as the Beech-18 and Douglas DC-3. The academy also prepares students for commercial aviation careers with advanced training facilities. With a focus on both vintage and modern aviation, Springbok Air Academy provides a holistic and rigorous educational experience, ensuring graduates are well-equipped for successful careers in the aviation industry.
